ModMetaData.name: Exotic Joy [1.0]
ModMetaData.author: ✬Rustic Fox✬
ModMetaData.description:
This mod will make tweaks to the base game you never knew you needed until now..
Adds the following:
✯ Horseshoe pins can now be used by all tech tiers ✯ Horseshoe pins now show you the use area (unless cutoff) ✯ Horseshoe pins are now rotatable ✯ Game of UR can now be used by all tech tiers ✯ Hoopstone can now be used by all tech tiers ✯ Hoopstone now show you the use area (unless cutoff) ✯ Hoopstone are now rotatable ✯ Chess Tables can now be used by all tech tiers ✯ Megascreen Televisions can now be constructed ✯ Telescopes can now be constructed
Research: - Telescope 1000 Requires MicroelectronicsBasics - Megascreen 2000 Requires FlatscreenTelevision and MicroelectronicsBasics - All research can be found under Rustic's Mods which is universal for my mods that require research (unless you use a mod tab editor then it will be whereever generated)
Compatibility - Should be compatable with everything. Uses xpath patching and overwrites no core files.
Older versions - https://github.com/RusticFox/Exotic-Joy
Credits: TheGoofyOne - for updating this mod to 1.0 and maintaining untill this point
